trans-unit.source: Represents the Conditions element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.5.1].
trans-unit.target: 表示在 [Saml2Core, 2.5.1] 中指定的“条件”元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类表示的元素的详细信息，请参阅 SAML 2.0 版核心规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies the audience to which the assertion is addressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定用户的集合，该用户是被声明指定的。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: A collection of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction" /> that specifies the audience for the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 为断言指定用户的类型 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AudienceRestriction" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is empty no restrictions on the audience apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合为空，则限制对用户不适用。

trans-unit.source: The AudienceRestrictions element.
trans-unit.target: AudienceRestrictions 元素中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the earliest time instant at which the assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断言有效的最早时间。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: A nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that contains the time instant in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 包含 UTC 中的有效时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 可为空。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="null" /> value indicates that the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示特性不存在的 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The NotBefore attribute.
trans-unit.target: NotBefore 属性中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotOnOrAfter" /> property is not <see langword="null" /> and an attempt to set a value that occurs on or after the time instant specified by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotOnOrAfter" /> property occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotOnOrAfter" /> 属性不是 <see langword="null" /> ，并尝试设置在由 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotOnOrAfter" /> 属性指定的时间常数之时获之后发生的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time instant at which the assertion has expired.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断言到期的时间。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: A nullable <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that contains the time instant in UTC.
trans-unit.target: 包含 UTC 中的有效时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 可为空。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="null" /> value indicates that the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示特性不存在的 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The NotOnOrAfter attribute.
trans-unit.target: NotOnOrAfter 属性中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotBefore" /> property is not <see langword="null" /> and an attempt to set a value that occurs before the time instant specified by the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotBefore" /> property occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotBefore" /> 属性不是 <see langword="null" />，并尝试设置在由 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Conditions.NotBefore" /> 属性指定的时间常数之前发生的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the assertion should be used immediately and must not be retained for future use.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定声明是否应被立即使用并不需在未来使用的值。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the assertion should be used immediately; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应立即使用断言，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The OneTimeUse element.
trans-unit.target: OneTimeUse 元素中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the limitations that the asserting party imposes on relying parties that wish to subsequently act as asserting parties themselves and issue assertions of their own on the basis of the information contained in the original assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断言方对依赖方的限制，后者希望不断充当断言方并基于原始断言中包含的信息颁发其自己的断言。

trans-unit.source: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]
trans-unit.target: [Saml2Core, 2.5.1]

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2ProxyRestriction" /> that contains the restrictions placed on subsequent asserting parties.
trans-unit.target: 包含放置在后续断言方的限制的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2ProxyRestriction" />。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyRestriction element.
trans-unit.target: ProxyRestriction 元素中。
